au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.server

Interface IServer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmbeddedJettyServer

    public interface IServer
    Server for hosting the SOAP interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String[] getAddress()
      Gets the addresses that may be used to connect to the rig client.
      boolean isListening()
      Returns true if the server is running and listening for requests.
      boolean startListening()
      Starts the server listening on the configured port.
      boolean stopListening()
      Shuts down the server.

    • Method Detail

      • startListening

        boolean startListening()
        Starts the server listening on the configured port.
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • stopListening

        boolean stopListening()
        Shuts down the server.
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise.

      • isListening

        boolean isListening()
        Returns true if the server is running and listening for requests.
        Returns:
        true if the server is running

      • getAddress

        java.lang.String[] getAddress()
        Gets the addresses that may be used to connect to the rig client.
        Returns:
        list of rig client addresses
